caption.title: Common community misconceptions about an HIV cure:

list-item.p: Complete viral suppression is a cure and people may stop taking their ART once viral loads are undetectable
The ‘West’ has a cure, for example Timothy Brown, which is being concealed from Africa
Patients can stop taking ART since witchcraft, pastors and prophets can cure HIV
Conspiracy theories, for example funders, advocates and pharmaceutical companies seem to be ‘quiet’ about cure
A cure is coming by 2030 (UNAIDS 90-90-90 target)
